sub_title: Export Consultant French beverages (wines, spirits and other beverages) at Business France Amsterdam
summary:
I am a multilingual (native French) person with many years of experience in Communication, Media Relations, Events, Brand Content and Promotions campaigns (online & offline). In my job as Export Consultant for Beverages at Business France, I assist French companies with their export activities on the Dutch market. Until recently, I worked for Sopexa, a Marketing & Communication agency focused on food, wine and lifestyle. In this role I was focused on B2B and B2C communication for international clients on the Dutch market. I am truly passionate about my work and always eager to connect with other professionals. While I enjoy most aspects of my job I think my favorite stage of a project is working with my clients to understand their business and their audience in order to realize their objectives. Colleagues know me as an enthusiastic connection cultivator who can build good relationships with the media and other stake holders.  
Previous experience was as a PR Manager with the luxury Renaissance Hotel in Amsterdam, part of Marriott Hotels & Resorts.
I am detail oriented/accurate and always try to think out the box. I  can be trusted to come up with new ideas/approach. I can (and mostly did) work well alone and I love  to  work together with others. My successes included the organization of many (food & wine) events and  press trips that received good media coverage and a positive image for the clients I represented. 
Finally I am always willing to learn and looking towards the horizon to see the newest ways of reaching the audiences. 
I can be reached either through this profile or by phone at +31-6- 515 04 884.

treasury_media.title: Wijnen met Stijl experts in Lyon - 2013
treasury_media.description: In het kader van de campagne Wijnen met Stijl hebben 5 experts een studiereis gemaakt in Lyon. Aan bod komen de wijnregio's Beaujolais en de noordelijke Rhône. Tevens worden wijnen uit geheel Frankrijk geproefd in de culinaire hoofdstad van Frankrijk, Lyon.

treasury_media.title: Vins de Bergerac & Vive le Fromage op de catwalk
treasury_media.description: Sponsoring van de Modeshow van Sheila de Vries door vins de Bergerac en Franse kazen Vive le Fromage.

treasury_media.title: France-Vins Amsterdam
treasury_media.description: Korte omschrijving van de vakbeurs France-Vins.nl in Amsterdam. Ruim 70 Franse wijnproducenten presenteerden hier hun wijnen aan de Nederlandse vakhandel. Aan het woord o.a. Harold Hamersma met een korte intro over Franse wijnen.

profile_positions.description:
Business France is the national agency for the international development of the French economy.
In my job as Export Consultant Beverages I assist French companies who are looking to expand on the Dutch market. I provide them market information, help them to find business partners and try to find customized solutions to help them realize their export goals and growth in The Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Export Consultant French beverages (wines, spirits and other beverages)

profile_positions.description:
Sopexa is a French Marketing & Communication group with a strong international network in 50 countries (40 offices). Sopexa is assisting clients to grow on export markets. 
As a PR Manager in the Netherlands I was promoting agribusiness and savoir-faire, food & beverages brands and products on the dutch market for our clients.
We offered a full range of expertise for tailor-made solutions, listening to our clients needs. 
I was assisting our clienst to enhance their image, to promote effectively their brands & products and expand their sales.
As a PR specialist I informed journalists and opinion leaders about food & beverages products, identifed the best angle to stimulate the interest of the Dutch media.
I designed and organized special tailor made events to generate buzz in the media.
Created communication materials, tracked media coverage and analysed results.

I am now open to new opportunities after Sopexa terminated its activities in the Netherlands in July 2016.

profile_positions.description: Internal & external PR activities to promote the hotel such as contacts withs the hotels (regulars &VIPs) guests, press contacts in order to get free publicity for the hotel, sights inspections of the hotel, editor newsletters, advertizing, developping special packages for life style magazines etc.
